from odw.core.util.logging_util import LoggingUtil
from pyspark.sql.types import *
import pprint
This gets the json schema from the data model repo and then uses that to produce a spark schema with some additional fields

import json

url: str = f"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Planning-Inspectorate/data-model/main/schemas/{entity_name}.schema.json"
LoggingUtil().log_info(f"Reading schema from {url}")
schema: dict = get_schema_from_url(url)

if not schema:
    LoggingUtil().log_error("No schema read")
    mssparkutils.notebook.exit('')

LoggingUtil().log_info("Schema read")
mssparkutils.notebook.exit(json.dumps(convert_to_datalake_schema(schema)))
